name: Le Samurai
description:
Game design for the very first Extra credits Game jam!!!

HOW TO PLAY:

- Use WASD to move.

- Use K for ultra samurai speed.

- Use J to attack wih your katana.

- Use P to pause.

- When you die you come back as a ghost, go look for your body to come to life again.

Pink trees give energy apples to recharge your energy bar.

When killed, enemies may drop some life.

Explore the world and defeat some foes with your katana and your awesome speed!!!
